gpu_get_zwriteenable.htm+html.head.title: gpu_get_zwriteenable.htm+html.body.p:87-3
gpu_get_zwriteenable: This function can be used to retrieve whether z-writing is enabled (the function returns true) or not (the function returns false). The default value is that z-writing is enabled, so the function will return true.

gpu_get_zwriteenable.htm+html.head.title: gpu_get_zwriteenable.htm+html.body.p:100-3
gpu_get_zwriteenable: The above code checks to see if z-writing is enabled or not and if it is disabled it is then enabled again.
